title: Non Lynda - Beyond the Logo: Crafting a Brand Identity
description:
Non Lynda - Beyond the Logo: Crafting a Brand Identity 

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

MP4 | aac, 44100 Hz, stereo | h264, yuv420p, 960x600, 30.00 fps(r) | 382MB
Genre: eLearning | Language: English 

Uploaded in Dec 9, 2015 by 2boweb


Develop a visual identity. Be instantly recognizable.
Logos are indispensable, but they dont exist in a vacuum. Seize the knowledge to make your logo the cornerstone of a fully realized brand identity in Courtney Eliseos 90-minute class on branding beyond the logo. From color and type to patterns and illustrations, you'll learn to recognize and craft crucial visual cues for conveying brand values and personality. In addition to 10 short video lessons, were thrilled to share 15 pages of specific, able resources to help you fully realize your project vision. Show your whole brand to the world.

Watch 10 video lessons.
Basics: What makes "brand identity" different from "brand," and how do they work together to support and enhance your logo
Applications: What are different considerations for print and digital media
Step-by-step decisions: We'll cover how to choose a coordinating color palette; how to choose complementary typography; and how to develop a library of additional supporting graphic elementsfrom patterns to secondary logos, illustrations, and more.
Final polish: We'll go over methods for organizing these components into a format suitable for a client presentation
